channel.title: Ruby on ZEN
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on ZEN

item.title: Ruby on Rails
item.description: 安装ruby sudo yum install ruby ruby-devel ruby -v #ruby 2.0.0p353 (2013-11-22 revision 43784) [i386-linux] 更新gem sudo gem update --system gem -v #2.4.1 安装rails gem install rails --no-ri --no-rdoc #27 gems installed rails -v #Rails 4.1.6 新建项目 rails new app/dir cd app/dir rails server 访问 http://0.0.0.0:3000/
